title: E.164 Number Mapping for the Extensible Provisioning Protocol (EPP)
abstract:
This document describes an Extensible Provisioning Protocol (EPP)  extension mapping for the provisioning and management of E.164
numbers that represent domain names stored in a shared central repository.  Specified in XML, this mapping extends the EPP domain name mapping to provide additional features required for the
provisioning of E.164 numbers.  [STANDARDS-TRACK]
